column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Hiroshi Sato says : " Asami .
#Text=How can we be a family after everything you 've done ?!
#Text=Mom would hate you for what you 've become .
#Text=" Hiroshi Sato says : " How dare you ?
#Text=I am avenging her death !
#Text=" Equalist says : " The airplanes are ready for take - off , sir .
#Text=" Hiroshi Sato says : " Good , annihilate the fleet .
#Text=" Hiroshi Sato says : " That 's right , general .
#Text=I intercepted your message to Commander Bumi .
#Text=I know exactly where they 're hiding .
#Text=" Asami says : " How are we gon na get out of here ?
#Text=" Iroh says : " I do n't suppose you know how to metalbend ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " That is a negative , Sir .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Naga !
#Text=Over here !
#Text=" Bolin says : " Who needs a metalbender ?
#Text=We got Naga !
#Text=Yeah !
#Text="
